presentation.PutTogether: Na u tla be u hlahisa? U ka sebelisa sebaka sena ho kenya hammoho lisebelisoa tsa tlhahiso ea hau. Sebelisa konopo ea Plus.
presentation.Alert: Ha liketsahalo li qala, leqephe lena le tla qala ho bontša linehelano tsa tsona tse tsamaellanang
presentation.ClickHereForFullscreen: Litlhahiso li tla hlaha mona. Tobetsa mona ho bula skrini se felletseng.

webInstructionsDialog.permissionDenied: Tumello ea {{kind}} e hanngoe. Ho e sebelisa, latela mehato ena:
webInstructionsDialog.point1: Eya ho "Litlhophiso" -> "E tsoetseng pele" -> "Lekunutu le tšireletseho" -> "Litlhophiso tsa Sebaka" -> "Khamera" kapa "Litlhophiso tsa Sebaka" -> "Microphone"

webIosInstructionsDialog.permissionDenied: Tumello ea {{kind}} e hanngoe. Ka kopo kenya leqephe lena bocha 'me u netefatse ho kena ho {{kind}} ho kenela seboka.
